
info( alias )
    Prints abbreviated help text for a specified alias.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias: any
        Alias (an object reference, literal, or a string).

    Examples
    --------
    > info( base.sin )
    > info( 'base.sin' )


info( alias.<key> )
    Prints abbreviated help text for a specified property.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias.<key>: any
        Alias property (an object reference, literal, or a string).

    Examples
    --------
    > info( {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from )
    > info( '{{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from' )
